dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, let us dispatch with th..."
dialogueTree.text: "Of course, let us dispatch with the formalities, you call me Evrart, I call you Harry!"

links.title: Evrart Claire: "For a fraction of a second the big..."
links.text: For a fraction of a second the big man looks at you inquisitively. "Experiencing partial amnesia, are we, Harry?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "It might be a good idea to hide you..."
links.text: It might be a good idea to hide your confusion, see what his game is first.

links.title: You: ""To be honest, my memory is a bit h..."
links.text: "To be honest, my memory is a bit hazy right now, yes."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I guess the stress of peace-keepin..."
links.text: "I guess the stress of peace-keeping and order-maintaining can get even to the best of us." He scratches his earlobe.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Don't be too hard on yourself, off..."
links.text: "Don't be too hard on yourself, officer. And if there's *anything* I can help you with, please don't hesitate to ask."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Do *not* trust him. For all you kno..."
links.text: Do *not* trust him. For all you know, it might be *his* name by which he is addressing you. You need confirmation.

links.title: You: ""Nah, my memory is fine -- I'm just..."
links.text: "Nah, my memory is fine -- I'm just testing you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm very glad to hear it. Some of..."
links.text: "I'm very glad to hear it. Some of my associates here in Martinaise told me you had trouble remembering things -- I am relieved they were mistaken."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm sure you had some concerns you..."
links.text: "I'm sure you had some concerns you thought I might be able to address." He pauses to look at a brown folder on his desk. "And you were probably right."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The huge block letters on the folde..."
links.text: The huge block letters on the folder read "HARRIER DU BOIS". There's something in small writing just above that...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see you have gotten hold of some..."
links.text: "I see you have gotten hold of some of our old documents." The lieutenant turns to Evrart. "They should have been destroyed some time ago."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mr. Kitsuragi..." He leaves the re..."
links.text: "Mr. Kitsuragi..." He leaves the rest of this sentence hanging in the air and lets his smug smile deliver the rest of the message.

links.title: Drama: ""Don't you worry, I've got plenty o..."
links.text: "Don't you worry, I've got plenty on you too, my rigid friend."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So Harry, what can I help you with..."
links.text: "So Harry, what can I help you with today?"
